name_localized.en: 1 Queen Bed ADA Room Accessible Bathtub
name_localized.es: 1 Queen Bed ADA Room Accessible Bathtub

short_description_localized.en: This mobility accessible room with a luxurious queen bed offers an ADA tub and an array of features in 200 square feet of space.
short_description_localized.es: This mobility accessible room with a luxurious queen bed offers an ADA tub and an array of features in 200 square feet of space.

description_localized.en:
Our mobility accessible room with one queen bed offers 200 square feet of space and an ADA tub with grab bars throughout the bathroom. Our breakfast room and fitness center are both accessible spaces as well. Just two blocks from the Empire State Building, the Hotel @ Fifth Avenue offers excellent value in Midtown Manhattan. Max. 2 guests.

Room accessibility features include: low peephole and security latches - low thermostat controls - ADA chair upon request
